Description:
Flat, Corner Allotment measuring 608m2 in Beautiful Trillium!
This fantastic opportunity of securing a rectangular & corner 608sqm allotment measuring 17m x 36m - a total land size of 608m2 has come up for a lucky family to build their dream home and to enjoy the peaceful surroundings, tranquil views and the cosmopolitan lifestyle planned in what's considered one of Melbourne's finest estates for years to come.
This prominent flat allotment is situated amongst Trillium's finest homes & future parkland just across the street. Trillium Estate, a beautiful master planned community in picturesque Mickleham, where family and friends can experience luxury, amenity and a true sense of community. At the heart of the Trillium community is the exclusive $4 million residents-only recreation facility, Club Trillium. With exceptional facilities including a heated four-lane 25-metre swimming pool, children's pool, gym, community garden and tennis court, the club is more than just a building, it's a place to connect with family and friends, old and new.
Just a few minutes to the south sits Greenvale, another established community providing a host of retail, education and other facilities - all just a few minutes' drive away.
Land: Approx. 608m2
Settlement: 30, 60 or 90 days
Asking $399,000
Contact: Phillip Mercieca - 0402 419 827
phillip.mercieca@raywhite.com
facebook.com/phillip.mercieca.raywhite

Address: 48 Rio Grande Drive Roxburgh Park VIC 3064
Description:
MUST BE SOLD!
Positioned perfectly In a quite court, sits this beautiful family home located only minutes walking or driving distance to Roxburgh Park Shopping Center, Roxburgh Park train Station and close to Homestead Shops as well as all major family and house hold needs.
The family will enjoy the space and free flowing floor plan that caters for both the young and old.
The home has two separate living zones including family living and formal lounge. Four bedrooms one of which the Master bedroom has a walk in robe and en-suite, three remaining sizeable bedrooms that have the luxury of bir's and a central bathroom to share. Well appointed Kitchen with ample bench space that overlooks a spacious dining area, and not mention, lovely manicured gardens.
On approximately 545m2, backyard is super important for youth and for family entertainment with an undercover pergola
Extras include - Ducted heating, Evaprotive cooling, Laminate Timber floors, Tiled wet areas, Awning blinds all around, Double garage with drive through access.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Settled Land - Ready to Build!!
This is a fantastic opportunity to own a piece of land in Cragieburn's Aston Estate. Offering approx. 375m2 of land approximately in the greatest development sight of Cragieburn. Key features of the block include 12.5m frontages and approx 30m depth. The suburb has been rapidly expanding in terms of population growth as well as facilities for many years now, a very small amount of blocks vacant for possession. This vacant land, titled and ready to build your dream home is only moments away from transport, primary & secondary schools, childcares, local shops, shopping centre, cafes, sporting facilities, park lands and many more...
Act fast and get your hands on this amazing block of land today!
Contact your Agents now!

Description:
AMAZING VALUE - $479,000
668m2 ( Approx ) , 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom
If location's important then look no further. At the end of a quiet cul de sac, walk to everything the area has to offer, including schools, shopping, sporting facilities, medical centres, and the train station. The possibilities are endless with this this hidden gem, an ideal first home, a great addition to your investment portfolio, or possibly redevelop (subject to council approval). With plenty of space for a young and growing family, the property has spacious living areas and good size bedrooms (master with ensuite), a lovely secluded courtyard, carport, and a large back garden. In good comfortable condition to move in and enjoy then renovate to your heart's content later.
Inspection is a must very keen vendor will meet the market.

Description:
Work From Home With Separate Home Office Space
Offering a perfect balance of space, style convenience and location, this modern 3-bedroom townhouse delivers on all fronts. This perfectly situated residence is directly across the road from the Stocklands Shopping Centre, Close by to schools (Mount Ridley College opposite), parklands and walking trails as well as public transport. The home itself with great size bedrooms, ensuite to the master as well as built in robes plus private balcony, open plan kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, separate guest toilet downstairs, light filled family room which lead's out to a low maintenance secure courtyard. Additional features including double lock up garage, heating and cooling to mention just a few. The home also features a rare MASSIVE rumpus room above the garage, ideal for artists, games and storage or even an office space to work from home. With all the local amenities at your fingertips this one needs to be inspected to be appreciated.
Call Now to Arrange an Inspection!

Description:
QUALITY AND SPACE IN PREMIER LOCATION
Meticulously presented, this young family home oozes with natural light and combines a Stylish and spacious comfortable interior for the whole family. Nestled in this quiet street in the popular Bridges
Estate of Craigieburn, offering a welcoming entry leading to one of the bedrooms, formal lounge room, open plan quality kitchen/meals and large family living area overlooking a Timber decked
Alfresco. The Master bedroom has a full Ensuite and walk-in-robe, all other bedrooms come with built-in robes, main bathroom and large laundry. There are lots of features such as Ducted Heating,
Evaporative Cooling, Quality kitchen with lots of storage, Induction cook top, stainless steel under bench oven and dishwasher, high ceiling, down lights, Double remote door garage and landscaped
Front and low maintenance back yard. Its a home that the whole family will enjoy for many years to come.

Description:
Fully Renovated
All the hard work put in with many sleepless night renovating this beautiful family home from top to bottom. From new lights to new floors, new mirrors to new doors, kitchen, bathrooms, paint even new toilet seats. Just purchase your furniture and move in. Buy the kids a bicycle even yourself, located in a lovely pocket of Roxburgh park and just a couple minutes walking distance to the new Roxburgh Park Shops, transport, schools and so much more.
The home offers -
Master with en-suite and walk in robe, 2 bedrooms with built in robes, central bathroom, Large living area, Formal lounge room, Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and adjoining meals area, Renovated bathroom
Fixtures & features
Evaporative cooling, Ducted heating, Great size backyard, Single lock up garage and more
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus

* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Like A Display Home! Top quality inclusions, luxury end of Mickleham!
Nestled in a Central Location, this single level family home is sure to make a lasting impression. An attractive facade, flowing floor plan, fabulous entertaining zones and impeccable surrounds illustrate the allure of this tastefully enhanced home delivering a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle with picture perfect views onto the famous greens of the Merrifield Estate.
The heart of the home is the open plan kitchen, meals and family room that is filled with loads of natural light and overlooks the alfresco area which seamlessly flows onto the decent size of backyard. Further complementing the homes seperate study area that opens to the low maintenance backyard.
Three spacious robed bedrooms serviced by a main bathroom, a master bedroom full en suite complete with a large walk in robe and double vanity. Below inclusion list will surely surprise you.
Bathrooms
• Tiles to ceiling to all bathrooms
• Freestanding bathtub
• Oval basins and premium tap ware
• Rimless toilets
• Multiheaded showers
• Aircon ducts to main bath and ensuite
• Skylight to main bath
Bedrooms
• Custom built in wardrobes to master
• Mirror wardrobes to other bedrooms
• Double glazed windows to master bedroom
• Fan points
Kitchen
• Ultra-glaze cabinetry with finger pull and soft close hinges
• 40mm stone benchtops throughout with waterfall to island
• Glass splashback to kitchen and pantry
• Pull-out Spice rack & rubbish bins
• Pot draws
• Microwave box
• Pull-out sink mixer
• 900mm appliances with ceramic glass cooktop and canopy rangehood
• Dishwasher
• Butler's pantry with sink and overhead cupboards and shelving
Main
• Timber lining to porch and alfresco ceiling
• Double timber finish entrance door
• 2700mm ceiling
• Built in TV cabinets
• Refrigerated cooling and gas heating
• High doors throughout
• Security doors to all sliding doors and flyscreens to all windows
• Downlights throughout including porch and alfresco.
• Alarm, Intercom, security camera
• Ducted vacuum
• 24 panel solar electric system
• Exposed aggregate driveway
Inspection is a must, enquire today! Call Vijeth Shetty 0432 407 840 or Kalley Singh 0433 927 573. Please note that all private inspections must be in accordance to social distancing guidelines set out by consumer affairs;

Description:
Ready Set Build!
Titled and ready to build this flat block measuring 540m2 is located in Annadale Estate with easy access to Donnybrook Road, conveniently located conveniently located across the parklands & near the future Mickleham Town Centre. The Annadale community is set to be the home of a new school, sports facility, playgrounds and integrated walking trails through the woodlands.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Brand New Excellence!
This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a quality built brand-new home in the highly desirable Botanical Estate. Immaculately presented, this home has been designed to offer an easy lifestyle with minimal maintenance.
Comprising of three generous sized bedrooms, master with walk in robe & full ensuite. Additional bedrooms both with built in robes, serviced by a central bathroom.
Open-plan living in the heart of the home, modern kitchen with stone benchtop & stainless steel appliances. Step outside to a low maintenance backyard, perfect for all your entertaining requirements.
Additional features include the comforts of evaporative cooling & ducted heating, spacious laundry with seperate toilet, double remote control garage with internal access, and much much more.
Perfect for the first home buyer or the acute investor-this one won't last long, inspection is a must!
Call us today!
Preet Brar 0416 085 144
Simran Khatrha 0431 178 435

Description:
The Perfect Future Home
Perfectly positioned in the heart of Roxburgh Park's most sought-after pocket and sitting on a huge block of approximately 620m2 within close proximity to all major amenities.
With an abundance of light and space, this home has so much to offer a big family or the growing one. Upon entry be surprised by the space of the first lounge and formal dining area which has internal access to the double lock up garage with both entry and rear access double and remote powered.
Big master bedroom with wir and en suite, two other bedrooms with bir's and the convenience of a spacious central bathroom.
Abundance of cupboard space, pantry and stainless steel appliances the kitchen looks over the living and dining area and access to a backyard we don't see often anymore, offering a massive outdoor covered entertainment area for all the big gatherings and room for the kids to play while we get through the winter months.
Fixtures Include, Ducted Heating, Evaprotive Cooling, Timber Floors, Carpet, Gas Appliances, Kitchenette in Garage and so much more.
Call to inspect this beauty today.

Description:
Presented with Pride
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented Family home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character. Offering stunning kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, great size master bedroom with his and hers walk in robe, large ensuite, open plan meals area with adjoining family room, rumpus/ theatre room, formal lounge, study to mention just a few.
Step outside and you will find an entertainer's delight with a large decked alfresco area which lead's out to the solar heating inground swimming pool making you the envy of all your friends during the summer months. A host of extras include high ceilings, ducted heating & evaporative cooling, gas log fire, QLD spotted gum flooring throughout the home, beautifully maintained carefree gardens and more. All this offering a blend of low maintenance living, without compromising space or comfort. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & close to parkland. With all the amenities close by including beautiful parklands, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, Splash Aquatic and leisure centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
SIMPLY IRRESISTIBLE!
In a sought after family-focused neighbourhood, this picture-perfect freestanding home is sure to leave a lasting impression with its generous design, immaculate presentation & central location to all of Craigieburn's facilities.
Beyond the gorgeous period-inspired facade, Step inside to discover an impeccable interior comprising a study with ample storage space, 3 double bedrooms (master with walk robe & private ensuite), central bathroom & separate WC, a spacious and light-filled open living/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed stone-top kitchen with stainless steel cooking appliances.
Other stand out features include, ducted heating, powerful split-system cooling, family sized laundry, remote garage, private pergola setting & beautifully landscaped gardens from front to back.
Located to perfection within seconds of Hothlyn Drive Reserve, walking distance to local buses, trains and a stone's throw away to primary & secondary schools as well as kindergartens and childcare facilities.
All situated within easy access to shopping centres & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Single-Level Sensation with Versatile Style
An environment of quality and flexibility that's ready to simply move in and enjoy, this
freestanding family residence is sure to make a lasting impression with its intelligent floorplan,long list of features and established garden surrounds. Bathed in natural light, the home's free-flowing interior showcases 4 bedrooms (large master with WIR) along with a stylish ensuite and equally-impressive main bathroom - both with stone-top vanities.
Adding to its family credentials is a versatile home office or retreat, expansive open-plan
living/dining area and quality stone-bench kitchen complete with stainless steel cooking
appliances, dishwasher and large walk-in pantry. Along with ducted heating throughout, this outstanding home also includes efficient LED lighting, family-sized laundry and internally-accessed double garage (r/c), plus a delightful al-fresco entertaining area and sizeable backyard with lush lawn.
Balmain Road buses at the end of the street and walking distance to Pinnacle Park, it also offers easy access to the Hume Freeway and Donnybrook Station, as well as close proximity to
Merrifield's future masterplan amenities which will include sports facilities, retail/dining precincts and schools.

Description:
SOLD $61,000 ABOVE RESERVE!
Boasting elegant dual living zones & infused with natural light, this impeccable three bedroom home provides that inviting feel that we all desire. Adorned with an aura of modern design, and unique lifestyle brilliance in a spectacular location, this home is an unmissable opportunity to procure a slice of an in-demand locale.
Highlights Include
• Formal lounge area
• Brand New Kitchen
• Dishwasher
• Soft Close Cabinets
• Meals area
• Second Living zone
• 3 Spacious Bedrooms
• Built in Robes
• Central Bathroom
• Spacious Internal Laundry
• Remote Drive through car port
• 2x Reverse Cycle Split Systems
• Spacious Garden Shed
Walk to Roxburgh Park Shopping Centre,(700 Meters) , Roxburgh Park Train Station,(850 Meters) Roxburgh Park Primary School (500 Meters ) & Roxburgh Park Secondary College (850 Meters )
Whether you are a first home buyer, investor or even looking to downsize this property ticks all your boxes.

Description:
Never leave home again!!
If you have been looking for a family sized home, look no further. This genuine home was built with the family in mind, featuring lots of living space, large bedrooms and open plan living, so you have an opportunity to secure a pristine home for you and your family. Whether the kids are young or fully grown there is plenty of living to be done in a home like this; the teenagers will have their own fully enclosed rumpus room to keep them out of the parents hair, the parents can utilise the sitting room for a bit of peace and quiet without getting in the way of the central living area adjacent to the kitchen/family room. Where this property really comes alive, though, is the extras that very few homes have in Mandalay: of course it backs onto the golf course! But it also boasts a massive 898m2 allotment with huge fully enclosed undercover area, drive through access to the backyard and side access for the boat or caravan. The owners have thought of everything here with not a thing to be done: it is simply a case of moving in and moving on.
Why are so many people moving to Mandalay Beveridge? If not for the resort style living and facilities such as a swimming pool, gymnasium, restaurant and community centre, maybe it is for the award winning golf course? Maybe it is just for the lifestyle of community living within easy access to the Hume Freeway? Realistically, I would suggest it is the combination of all of these factors which are making people turn to Mandalay Beveridge for their next home.
